resources.string:
-NOTICE: This is a beta release with no support

-NOTICE: To add/remove screens press MENU/Edit Desktop

--------------
Version 0.17:
- Fix FC with catalogs less than Android 2.3, other changes to catalogs
Version 0.16:
- Changes for animations, adjustable font color, update to apps list (Cyanogenmod)

Version 0.15:
- Tunable drawer overshoot, desktop text bold, other fixes for sliding view

March 2012, Chislon Chow
